text: Inene Sikubonile ukubhekisa kwakho ubuso bakho ezulwini, Ngenene Siya kukubhekisa kwi’Kiblah eza kukukholisa, Ngoko ke bhekisa ubuso bakho kwicala leMasjid eNgcwele. Naphi na apho nina bantu nikhoyo, bhekisani ubuso benu kwelo cala. Inene abantu ababenikwe isiBhalo bakwazi ngcono okokuba ukujongisa ngakwiKa’bha eseMakkah emthandazweni yinyaniso leyo evela eNkosini yabo. Yaye UAllâh Ayingaba Akanalwazi ngoko bakwenzayo
